name: Dark Age
description:
Embark on an electrifying journey through 5 offbeat themed locations that will test your skills. Dark Age promises a different and unique gaming experience.

Choose between 5 different characters and dive headfirst into this fast-paced, action-packed universe. Emotion knows no limits in this futuristic work.

Don't miss the opportunity to be part of the Dark Age phenomenon, a game where emphasis meets intensity and each hit has a great impact.
